content: changing or implementing new rules as unique questions are asked for a list of these rules email cindy at smoothfoxhelpercindy@yahoo com if you d like to see the online angel website - here is the link http //onlineangels myftp org/ be sure to click on the large angel if you click on the home tab you can select the prior year to see how many charity boxes they have put together and shipped out contact info for online angels is mary reinhart onlineangels@verizon net 570-544-5975 5 void where prohibited form on next page remember if we can t read your handwriting or if you don t submit a good mailing address or give us a bad email address or don t supply your email address to contact you or don t insert the form below we can t notify you if you are the winner we are not responsible for lost packages unreadable handwriting returned mail or no contact information in your package 6 print out this form or handwrite and put inside of your mailed package please don t forget to put the form in with your squares print all information contact name ________________________________________ address ___________________________________________ city state zip ___________________________________________ email address ____________________________________________________ contact phone number _____________________________ i am participating as an individual - yes or no track my individual progress for a presidential award - yes or no i am representing a team/group yes or no my team name is ______________________________________________ if my team wins make the cashiers check out to the following business charity or organization ___________________________________________________________________________________ square count in package square count using smoothfox crochet patterns for 6x6 or 7x7 _________ times 2 points each = _________ square count using smoothfox crochet patterns for 12x12 _________ times 8 points each = _________ square count using non smoothfox crochet patterns 6x6 or 7x7_________ times 1 point each = _________ square count using non smoothfox crochet patterns 12x12 _________ times 4 points each = _________ square count using knit patterns for 6x6 _________ times 2 points each = _________ square count using knit patterns for 12x12 __________ times 8 points each = _________ total points i feel are included in my package ___________ cid 1 mail packages monthly to - online angels attn smoothfox 36b pine drive pottsville pa 17901 upon receipt of your squares this is mary s count of total points awarded ____________________________ 7
